properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 3 at 5:16AM CST until February 5 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with
gusts up to 60 mph expected.  For the High Wind Watch,
northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph possible.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas.

* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 11 AM MST Tuesday. For
the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines.
Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches.  If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING FOR GAP WINDS THROUGH GUADALUPE PASS
